meta.description: Minimize the total time needed to transport at least 300 fish using helicopters and cars with constraints on the number of trips.

sets.name: MODES
sets.description: Modes of transportation available for fish.

params.name: fish_per_trip
params.description: Number of fish each mode can transport per trip.

params.name: time_per_trip
params.description: Time in minutes each trip takes for each mode.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips taken by each mode.

objective.name: min_total_time
objective.expr: sum(trips[m] * time_per_trip[m] for m in MODES)
objective.description: Minimize the total time needed for all trips.

constraints.name: fish_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(trips[m] * fish_per_trip[m] for m in MODES)
constraints.description: At least 300 fish need to be transported.

constraints.name: helicopter_trip_limit
constraints.description: At most 5 helicopter trips can be made.

constraints.name: car_trip_minimum
constraints.description: At least 60% of the trips should be by car.
